text: Armington is a village in Tazwell County, Illinois in the United States. The population was 310 at the 2020 census. It is part of the Peoria, Illinois Metropolitan Statistical Area. == Geography == Armington is located at (40.339078, -89.313741). According to the 2020 census, Armington has a total area of , which is all land. == References == Category:Villages in Illinois
title: Armington, Illinois
